name: Cats War
description:
Cats War is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter. You have to play as a cat who wants to take revenge on the ducks for their bad deeds! You have deadly fists, a bat and even a pistol in your arsenal! Punish all ducks and collect all flowers.

If you love 3rd person shooters, then this game will definitely win your heart! This game will give you an unforgettable shooting experience. In this game you will need to take revenge on the dirty ducks for their bad deeds! They stole flowers from your flower bed! Take all the flowers that these tricky ducks have stolen. Also, for fans of street racing, the game has a vehicle that will make you feel like the king of the road! Enjoy playing this game with funny music. The atmosphere of fun will be throughout the game. This game will give you real emotions !!!

Features of the game:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Catchy, intuitive gameplay!
Incredibly beautiful city and characters!
Very beautiful graphics!
